response.documentation:
This allowance was introduced on the 1st of Jan 1980.
It disappeared in Dec 2016.

1980-01-01.content:
def formula_1980(household, period, parameters):
    """Housing allowance.

    This allowance was introduced on the 1st of Jan 1980. Calculating it
    before this date will always return the variable default value, 0.

    To compute this allowance, the 'rent' value must be provided for the
    same month, but 'housing_occupancy_status' is not necessary.
    """
    return household("rent", period) * parameters(period).benefits.housing_allowance
